keyPolicies.policyDescription: Defend our NHS and tackle the care crisis. Give the NHS and social care services the money they need and open up services from hospital to home.

Protect living standards and all create jobs. Introduce a real living wage of £10 per hour and invest in infrastructure, skills and new technology. Labour is committed to keeping the Triple Lock for pensioners.
Provide affordable homes to rent and buy. Build more than a million new homes in five years and tackle the worst examples of private sector housing exploitation.
Give power back to local communities. Give local people a stronger say in the way their high streets and town centres develop.
Give all children a chance to achieve. Provide universal free school meals for primary school children and reduce class sizes.

issues.economy: Introduce a real living wage of £10 per hour and invest in infrastructure, skills and new technology.
issues.education: Provide universal free school meals for primary school children and reduce class sizes.
issues.health: Defend our NHS and tackle the care crisis. Give the NHS and social care services the money they need and open up services from hospital to home.

housing.content: Provide affordable homes to rent and buy. Build more than a million new homes in five years and tackle the worst examples of private sector housing exploitation.
